Attacks.Name: Thundershock
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Charm
Attacks.Effect: The target character has its attack strength reduced by 2 on its next attack.

Superpowers.Name: Static
Superpowers.Effect: If this character is targeted by a melee attack, the attacker gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Sweet Kiss
Attacks.Effect: The target character gains the Confused special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Pikachu character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
